from pyspark.sql.types import StringType, TimestampType, DateType, IntegerType, DecimalType, BooleanType, StructType
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, lit, udf, to_date
import uuid

# Read data from lake
df_Southridge_Sales_Customers = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/Southridge/CloudSales/dbo.Customers.parquet',
                        format='parquet',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_FourthCoffee.printSchema
#display(df_FourthCoffee.limit(100))

# Read data from lake
df_Southridge_Sales_Adresses = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/Southridge/CloudSales/dbo.Addresses.parquet',
                        format='parquet',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_FourthCoffee.printSchema
#display(df_FourthCoffee.limit(100))

# Read data from lake
df_Southridge_Streaming_Customers = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/Southridge/CloudStreaming/dbo.Customers.parquet',
                        format='parquet',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_FourthCoffee.printSchema
#display(df_FourthCoffee.limit(100))

# Read data from lake
df_Southridge_Streaming_Adresses = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/Southridge/CloudStreaming/dbo.Addresses.parquet',
                        format='parquet',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_FourthCoffee.printSchema
#display(df_FourthCoffee.limit(100))

# Read data from lake
df_FourthCoffee = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/FourthCoffee/Rentals/Transactions.csv',
                        format='csv',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_FourthCoffee.printSchema
#display(df_FourthCoffee.limit(100))

# Read data from lake
df_vanArsdel = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/VanArsdel/OnPremRentals/dbo.Transactions.parquet',
                        format='parquet',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_vanArsdel.printSchema
#display(df_vanArsdel.limit(100))

# Rename columns
df_FourthCoffeeModified = df_FourthCoffee.withColumnRenamed("TransactionID", "SourceSystemTransactionID")

# Add column3
df_FourthCoffeeModified = (
    df_FourthCoffeeModified.withColumn("SourceSystemID", lit("2").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("GlobalTransactionID", uuidUDF())
)

# Reorder colums
df_FourthCoffeeModified = df_FourthCoffeeModified.select(
    'SourceSystemID',
    'GlobalTransactionID',
    'SourceSystemTransactionID',
    'CustomerID',
    'MovieID',
    'RentalDate',
    'ReturnDate',
    'RentalCost',
    'LateFee',
    'RewindFlag',
    'CreatedDate',
    'UpdatedDate'
)

# Convert column types
df_FourthCoffeeModified = (
    df_FourthCoffeeModified.withColumn("SourceSystemID", col("SourceSystemID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("GlobalTransactionID", col("GlobalTransactionID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("SourceSystemTransactionID", col("SourceSystemTransactionID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("CustomerID", col("CustomerID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("MovieID", col("MovieID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("RentalDate", to_date(col("RentalDate").cast(StringType()), "yyyymmdd"))
                           .withColumn("ReturnDate", to_date(col("ReturnDate").cast(StringType()), "yyyymmdd"))
                           .withColumn("RentalCost", col("RentalCost").cast(DecimalType()))
                           .withColumn("LateFee", col("LateFee").cast(DecimalType()))
                           .withColumn("RewindFlag", col("RewindFlag").cast(BooleanType()))
                           .withColumn("CreatedDate", col("CreatedDate").cast(DateType()))
                           .withColumn("UpdatedDate", col("UpdatedDate").cast(DateType()))
)

# Display dataframe
#df_FourthCoffeeModified.printSchema
#display(df_FourthCoffeeModified.limit(100))

# Rename columns
df_vanArsdelModified = df_vanArsdel.withColumnRenamed("TransactionID", "SourceSystemTransactionID")

# Add columns
df_vanArsdelModified = (
    df_vanArsdelModified.withColumn("SourceSystemID", lit("3").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("GlobalTransactionID", uuidUDF())
)

# Reorder colums
df_vanArsdelModified = df_vanArsdelModified.select(
    'SourceSystemID',
    'GlobalTransactionID',
    'SourceSystemTransactionID',
    'CustomerID',
    'MovieID',
    'RentalDate',
    'ReturnDate',
    'RentalCost',
    'LateFee',
    'RewindFlag',
    'CreatedDate',
    'UpdatedDate'
)

# Convert column types
df_vanArsdelModified = (
    df_vanArsdelModified.withColumn("SourceSystemID", col("SourceSystemID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("GlobalTransactionID", col("GlobalTransactionID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("SourceSystemTransactionID", col("SourceSystemTransactionID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("CustomerID", col("CustomerID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("MovieID", col("MovieID").cast(StringType()))
                           .withColumn("RentalDate", to_date(col("RentalDate").cast(StringType()), "yyyymmdd"))
                           .withColumn("ReturnDate", to_date(col("ReturnDate").cast(StringType()), "yyyymmdd"))
                           .withColumn("RentalCost", col("RentalCost").cast(DecimalType()))
                           .withColumn("LateFee", col("LateFee").cast(DecimalType()))
                           .withColumn("RewindFlag", col("RewindFlag").cast(BooleanType()))
                           .withColumn("CreatedDate", col("CreatedDate").cast(DateType()))
                           .withColumn("UpdatedDate", col("UpdatedDate").cast(DateType()))
)

# Display dataframe
#df_vanArsdelModified.printSchema
#display(df_vanArsdelModified.limit(100))
